sentences.en: As a cricketer, gymnastics is out of his domain.
sentences.cn: 他是个板球运动员, 体操非其所长.

sentences.en: His domain extends for 20 miles in every direction.
sentences.cn: 方圆20英里之内都是他的地产.

sentences.en: Is the domain name already registered or still available?
sentences.cn: 该域名已经被注册还是仍然可用？

sentences.en: It is outrageous that the figures are not in the public domain.
sentences.cn: 让人愤慨的是那些数字并未公开。

sentences.en: Looking after the house was viewed as a woman’s domain.
sentences.cn: 料理家务被认为是女性的份内之事。

sentences.en: Physics is within [ out of ] his domain.
sentences.cn: 物理是 [ 不是 ] 他的专长.

sentences.en: The Arctic remains the domain of the polar bear.
sentences.cn: 北极仍是北极熊的领地.

sentences.en: The care of older people is being placed firmly within the domain of the family.
sentences.cn: 照顾老人仍然被确认为是家庭范围的事。

sentences.en: the extent of the royal domain
the extent of the royal domainv
The flow domain has the form of an infinite half strip.
sentences.cn: 流动区域为一半无限带形区域.

sentences.en: The information has been placed in the public domain.
The interval OC is known as the domain of dependence.
The state of their marriage has been put into the public domain.
sentences.cn: 他们的婚姻状况已公开。

sentences.en: This information should be in the public domain.
sentences.cn: 这一消息应该为公众所知。

sentences.en: This question comes into the domain of philosophy.
sentences.cn: 这一问题属于哲学范畴.

sentences.en: This results from the irreversible motion of domain boundaries.
sentences.cn: 这是由于磁畴边界的不可逆运动所致.

phrases.tran_cn: [律]土地征用权；国家最高支配权

trans.tran_en: an area of activity, interest, or knowledge, especially one that a particular person, organization etc deals with
